title: Byteex Landing Page
description: An example of developing a landing page with flexible responsive design. Main framework - Next.js 14 with Tailwind, dynamic content using Strapi. Cloud hosting Vercel / Strapi.

title: Github Kanban Board
description: The app downloads issues from the GitHub API and creates a Kanban board with the ability to drag and drop between columns and reorder issues. Saving drag-and-drop results and implementing integration tests.

title: Charity Project Big Hearts
description: The application makes it possible to post advertisements in which you can offer free things or services, or advertisements requesting help or collecting donations.

title: Schema Questionnaires
description: Psychological test - multi-language, dark/light theme, saving results to the database and sending PDF results by email, access to view results in the application by authorization (access/refresh tokens).

title: Copywriters Landing page
description: Landing page for a copywriter demonstrates the topics of work that can be ordered, the timing and cost of services, the advantages of their work, and positive customer reviews.

title: Website for the Lyceum
description: Website for the Kyiv Technical Lyceum. Installing and configuring the WordPress package, adding plugins. Customization of the theme and functionality. Migrating a database from Drupal.

title: My Personal Page
description: My personal page, itâ€™s about me, my skills, my projects and getting in touch.

title: Simple Chat
description: A single-page application implements simple chat functionality. Instant data exchange using websockets.

title: Todo App
description: A single-page application that allows users to create and manage a list of tasks.

title: Gadgets Online Store
description: A single-page application implements online store functionality.

title: 2048 Game
description: My version of the game 2048. The game is implemented for both the desktop version and mobile devices. The playing field can be moved using the arrow keys on the keyboard or by swiping on the screen.

title: Potr Pots Landing Page
description: Landing page for POTR POTS Self Watering Plant Pots. Provides information about the features of using pots, the advantages compared to other pots, and the creators. There is a feedback form on the page.

title: Crazybaby Landing Page
description: Landing Page Presentation for Luna Eye Speakers: Unveiling detailed insights into the product, its technical features, and the numerous advantages it brings.

title: Museum Landing Page
description: Landing page for the National Art Museum of Ukraine. Provides information about museum opening hours, ticket prices, current exhibitions and events, displays a gallery of some paintings, and displays a form for subscribing to museum news.

title: NAMU Landing Page
description: The second version of the landing page for the National Art Museum of Ukraine. According to the technical specifications, only the main page has been implemented, links to other pages are not working.

title: MyBike Landing Page
description: Landing page for a bicycle store. Demonstrates the most popular models, describes the main characteristics and advantages and provides a contact form.

title: Miami Landing Page
description: Landing page for a real estate agency. Provides information about the agency's work, demonstrates several of the most attractive real estate properties, displays reviews of the agency's clients and provides a contact form.
